website_summaries.verdict: The tireless efforts of the designers and engineers over at Berghaus seem to have paid off in the Explorer Trek Plus GTX. Indeed, from its plush comfort and reliable waterproofing, to its barely-there weight and outstanding traction, this lightweight day hiking footgear leaves nothing to be desired. That said, the boot came under fire for its substandard outsole. All in all, outside its letdown of an outsole, the Berghaus Explorer Trek Plus GTX still makes for a worthy day hiking boot.
pros: Scores of wearers regarded the Explorer Trek Plus GTX as a remarkably lightweight boot, and critics couldn’t agree more
According to numerous reports, this day hiking gear leaves no room for water intrusion
Expert reviewers and dozens of users alike were all praises for the boot’s glue-like traction
A lot of wearers didn’t think twice in calling the Berghaus Explorer Trek Plus GTX extremely comfortable
The boot’s ankle shaft is as supportive as they come, based on several favorable reviews
A handful of buyers enthusiastically praised the affordable price tag of this day hiking footwear
Lengthwise, a few users found a true-to-size fit in the Explorer Trek Plus GTX
A professional blogger was genuinely appreciative of the boot’s stabilizing midsole
cons: Many owners were disgusted by the boot’s outsole
They said that it peeled away too quickly,
This Berghaus footwear received much ire from a handful of owners for its restrictive width
Based on a professional critique, the Explorer Trek Plus GTX could use a little bit more ventilation, especially on extremely hot days

customer_reviews.title: Repeat purchase
customer_reviews.text: These boots are excellent. I have just discarded my last pair, (the soles fell off) bought and used frequently on South Downs and in Switzerland over the last 14years. They are lightweight and immediately comfortable for my broad size 4 feet, yes with herediatery bunions (always worn sensible shoes)! I fully expect my new pair to be as waterproof as the first pair always were. They were delivered two days ahead of expected date, only two days after placing the order, and £32 cheaper than Millets on the high street. I have checked about the lifetime guarantee being void if bought through Amazon and have been assured that is not the case.
customer_reviews.author: Jill G

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Warning - Berghaus do not honour their guarantee for boots bought through Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon.

customer_reviews.title: Booted up!
customer_reviews.text: For many years I have always had different versions of these Berghaus walking boots. For the last few pairs I have purchased my normal shoe size of 6.5 and they haven't needed any 'breaking in'.. This time however I ordered with trepidation as reviews suggested they were different from old styles and caused ankle blisters. I haven't done a proper hike in them yet but have been testing them by walking to the gym etc and they feel absolutely fine so far!
customer_reviews.author: Faye

customer_reviews.title: Amazing shoes!
customer_reviews.text: These boots are amazing! They are so comfortable and fit great. I have quite wide feet and they don't feel too tight. I also have a lot of problems in general because of a bad break and these are fine to walk in for quite long periods of time. My only problem is that they are a little bit tight around the ankles at first but they are already starting to break in. I am really happy with this and they are so far worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah

customer_reviews.title: They look smart but can't handle the Costa Rican wet season
customer_reviews.text: Sadly I returned these as they were not blue but black, I tried re-ordering and again black, so I purchased them elsewhere. They are narrower than what I am used to with Berghaus but I am hopeful they will give a bit. They look smart and other than being slightly narrow, they feel comfortable An update to my review above, the fit has actually been fine but sadly the Gortex has about 2hrs only before it lets water in, so in Costa Rica twice I have ended up walking in puddles with the boots the 1st time taking 3 days to dry, the 2nd a week, somewhat disappointed
customer_reviews.author: SC

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought Berghaus explorer for years, these are my fourth pair, but the design has changed and I find that they are tight and dig into my ankle. After only walking a quarter of a mile, the pain in my Achilles tendon was so bad I turned and went back home for my old pair. I am wearing them around the house to see if I can wear them in, I do hope so as I really don’t need a pair of boots that give me tendinitis.
customer_reviews.author: T Evans

customer_reviews.title: I ordered these boots as my daughter has a pair ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these boots as my daughter has a pair that she allowed me to wear when my boots got too damaged to wear. I tend to wear boots out by my dog walking. I have rheumatoid arthritis and bunions have come about because of this but these boots accomodate me really well. The only thing that takes a star off is the heel. I can feel it catching my heel painfully. Maybe thicker socks in the winter will cure that.
customer_reviews.author: SionedGoch

customer_reviews.title: Really Happy
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my partner, and she has been really happy with them. They are comfortable and lightweight, and she has had no issues with them as you might expect with new boots - wore them straight out of the box. Weather has been dry since purchasing, so not tested them in wet conditions, but on road and rough terrain alike, they have been great so far.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Painful around the ankles
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to complete the Coast to Coast Walk (190 miles) and to replace my previous two pairs of Berghaus boots, started with some practice walks and managed to complete 40 miles of walking before the boots were really uncomfortable around the ankles causing serious bruising. Haven't been able to wear them since even with two pairs of socks and some serious padding around the ankle. Will just have to go back to wearing my old boots for the long distance walk as I haven't time to walk in a new pair. Shame really as the boots were comfy apart from round the ankles.
customer_reviews.author: Wina

customer_reviews.title: Painful pressure just above ankle
customer_reviews.text: The foot part of the boot is very comfy with loads of wriggle room for toes and for thick socks. However, the cuff above the ankle is a bit stiff and has bruised my lower leg on the second wearing. I am currently trying to stretch it and will try again with thicker socks and lacing it differently. It’s a pity as they give very good ankle support.
customer_reviews.author: Millie's mum

customer_reviews.title: Excellent boot my 3rd pair
customer_reviews.text: Excellent boot, comfortable and water tight. Previous two pairs each lasted over 3 years, worn daily for 8 months of the year walking our Border Collie in local forest. Brought online this time as local Millets store closed. Worst thing is the first week “breaking” then in!
customer_reviews.author: Birkland

customer_reviews.title: True fit with room for thick sock.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a 5.5 normally. The 5.5 in these still leaves enough room for a thick walking sock. I have a normal/general width of foot. Definitely not a slim or wide foot, but these boots are generous on width. Had them now 3 mths. Wear them most days walking the dog. Forest walks. Light, dry and warm. My old issue would be the right boot rubs on my inner ankle bone. Thick socks or not tightening the boot as much can help.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Helen Shaw

customer_reviews.title: I've had two pairs of similar boots which were perfect but these are different
customer_reviews.text: I've had two pairs of similar boots which were perfect but these are different. The were tight for my wide feet and immediately gave me pins and needles. Had to return them, sadly.
customer_reviews.author: REBECCA H.

customer_reviews.title: Worn every day September to may
customer_reviews.text: Always warm, always waterproof, always comfy... I w or ok outside, this is my second pair having worn the previous ones down to “slicks”, still warm and waterproof but sloppy in the ice. Will buy again in a couple of years if these wear out.
customer_reviews.author: djaif

customer_reviews.title: Happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: Happy with the boots which are great quality for the price. They are comfortable (used every day for dog walking often over rough, muddy terrain) and a good weight. Sizewise the length is fine, as is the width (having read the reviews I went for the larger of the two sizes I vary between), but there is quite a gap over the toes which I wasnt expecting. Not causing a problem so far so hope it continues.
customer_reviews.author: Karen W

customer_reviews.title: Get a size bigger if you do lots of hill walking
customer_reviews.text: Bought size 5.5 UK size which is my shoe size. If you do serious hill hiking I would recommend between a half and a full size larger than your normal size. But for light walking (up to 5 miles) these are great size. Fairly heavy boot but I like that
customer_reviews.author: Caz

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic walking boots 😃
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots iv always had these boots for years .. usually buy at go out doors but won’t be any more .. price is good aswell 😃
customer_reviews.author: mrs sharon goodchild

customer_reviews.title: Not as comfortable as my last pair bought ten years ago
customer_reviews.text: Stiff and higher around the ankle. Need to use extra inner sole and two pairs of socks to prevent rubbing. Not as comfortable as my last pair bought ten years ago.
customer_reviews.author: pat Hartley

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of boots.
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of boots. Replacement for my last pair of faithful Berghaus which I had for 12 years. Christened on new years day in the worst of the weather and they were more than up to the task. Extremely comfortable, bought 1/2 size up which accommodates a thick walking sock very nicely. Thoroughly recommend these boots, love them.
customer_reviews.author: tiggysplace

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have had the same boots for years and loved them so was upset when, after many years of faithful service, a split appeared in them. However, Berghaus still make the same boot and these are just as comfortable so I am happy again!
customer_reviews.author: Ab

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous boots.
customer_reviews.text: They are very lovely looking boots and very comfortable and I have wide feet and they fit me perfect. Very pleased with them and they kept my feet dry and warm.
customer_reviews.author: sandra

customer_reviews.title: Very nice boots but will take a bit of wearing in!
customer_reviews.text: Seemed to fit well but caused the worst blisters I've ever had above the back of my heel where they grip. Will protect these spots with plasters and wear thicker socks the next time I wear them. Ouch!
customer_reviews.author: ETHELC

customer_reviews.title: Great quality.
customer_reviews.text: I have bought these boots before as they have always been very good quality, hard-wearing and very comfortable. I use them for country walks.
customer_reviews.author: Flower

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant boots!
customer_reviews.text: Really pleased with these boots. I opted for my shoe size (6.5/40) and the fit is excellent - using either normal or medium weight socks. No "breaking in" needed, any stiffness soon eased, and the soles have much more grip than I anticipated looking at them. Always pleased with Berghaus products.
customer_reviews.author: Linda C

customer_reviews.title: So comfy
customer_reviews.text: Second pair of these boots. The ankle support is a little stiff to begin with but after just a few short dog walks, its no longer felt. Older pair are being kept at my holiday home as they have loads of life left in them still after several years wear. The fact that I've bought the exact same boots again says it all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well made but much too wide and rigid
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to replace my worn out wonderful old pair of Berghaus boots. Unfortunately they were way too wide for my average size feet and very rigid and uncomfortable so I had to return them.
customer_reviews.author: R B

customer_reviews.title: Really happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with my purchase. Usually buy a 40 or 41 so I wasn’t sure which size to go for. Decided on a 40 which was just right. 5miles with no problem on day one.
customer_reviews.author: Tapenade 40

customer_reviews.title: Great Boots
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd pair of these boots over the years. They are comfortable and sturdy for hill walking, over rough terrain or just walking the dog. I wear them all seasons and they have never let me down.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable sturdy boot
customer_reviews.text: I have had several pairs of this boot and they are a good comfortable boot and I do a lot of walking averaging 8 mikes a day and they are very comfortable and sturdy they quite a wide fitting boot and they fit accordingly so if you are a size 5 normally order a size 5
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A wonderful lightweight walking boot
customer_reviews.text: A wonderful lightweight walking boot. Not used for serious hiking but perfect for walking the dog in wet grass, on the beach or up local cliffs, etc. So good that we got some the same for our daughter, who uses them for the more serious stuff on moors and fells!
customer_reviews.author: Joe Foster

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Fit like a glove, and I have fussy feet! Love these boots, comfy from the get go. I would definitely recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: TracyL

customer_reviews.title: Great boot, needed half size bigger
customer_reviews.text: Size 6 was too small where normally every other pair of shoes/boots is size 6 is good these were a bit too tight, so went half size up to 6.5 and they fit great..
customer_reviews.author: Antony Allen

customer_reviews.title: Great grip, and ankle support
customer_reviews.text: Second pair in four years. Walk a lot different terrains, from beaches to Snowdon. Last well good grip, nikwax often last for ages
customer_reviews.author: Rowena

customer_reviews.title: Light weight boots
customer_reviews.text: Found these most suitable for my wife. Nice and comfortable and very light. Pleased with product
customer_reviews.author: Forensic Pod

customer_reviews.title: Great for summer walks
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and a firm fit. Just the job for summer walks but they also look good as casual wear with jeans
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Excellent walking boots
customer_reviews.text: My previous pair disintegrated (wear and tear) after 13 years so I was forced to buy a new pair. Decided to go for these and haven’t regretted it... comfy, sturdy and they look great. I’m hoping these will last another few years! I bought them slightly larger to accommodate walking socks.
customer_reviews.author: Biene

customer_reviews.title: very pleased. Great delivery service
customer_reviews.text: I always buy Berghaus walking boots, quality make, I know they will fit, no need to break in, very pleased. Great delivery service.
customer_reviews.author: Lovelife!

customer_reviews.title: Extremely disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Only purchased these in March 2019 already all the eyelets have come off Extremely disappointed, my previous pair lasted 3 years. I have hardly worn these. They are now unwearable 😢
customer_reviews.author: sarah norbury

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable boots. Went on 4 mile walk through woods
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable boots. Went on 4 mile walk through woods, hills and rough paths in the rain on their first trek, kept we dry and no rubbing. Service with delivery was excellent, arrived before expected.
customer_reviews.author: Marion Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: They were a good price and were comfortable from day one.
customer_reviews.author: Geraldine Lowe

customer_reviews.title: They are so worth it
customer_reviews.text: Amaze balls These are light have good grip and are comfy to wear They fit perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great boots
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews and was a bit wary of the sizes. I am a size 5 and these fit great. I have worn them a few times as I walk our dogs and they are great. They did not rub or make my feet ache. Not tried them with thick socks. I do not feel you need to.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs S D O'Reilly

customer_reviews.title: Easy to wear and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Bought men's by mistake, which fiit perfectly, but decided to go for women's at nearly £40 cheaper, fit just the same! Easy to wear and comfortable already
customer_reviews.author: nel

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and so far so good. Cannot give 5 stars until I find out how well they last though.
customer_reviews.author: Ellizabeth Jane Sharp

customer_reviews.title: Really well made
customer_reviews.text: These boots are really well made and really comfortable. Combined with no blister walking socks - after 2 days of walking - no problems .
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Good value.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a pair of waterproof boots quickly. These arrived on time and fit well. I am very pleased with them. Good sole, comfy fit and not heavy.
customer_reviews.author: J Gregory

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value for money
customer_reviews.text: Hurt the first couple times I wore them but didn't take long to break them in. Climbed a mountain and done a few treks and can safely say they are worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Miss M Warrington

customer_reviews.title: Excellent walking boot
customer_reviews.text: I've just replaced the same explorer boot after years of wear and a lot of miles. These remain good quality and hopefully will endure as long as the last pair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great boots
customer_reviews.text: Great boots, bought to replace Berghaus boots that lasted me about 12 years, these are as good, true to size fit and well constructed
customer_reviews.author: jude

customer_reviews.title: Fab
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous boots always buy these - no blisters or sore feet
customer_reviews.author: ANNE WRIGHT

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic company would definitely recommend them
customer_reviews.text: Boot as described but found I needed the next half size up. Fantastic company would definitely recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... of these boots over the years and they are fantastic. Comfey from day one even after a long ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had several pairs of these boots over the years and they are fantastic. Comfey from day one even after a long walk.
customer_reviews.author: S MCCRAIGHT

customer_reviews.title: As close a like for like replacement for my wife's last pair of ...
customer_reviews.text: As close a like for like replacement for my wife's last pair of Berghaus boots as we could get - worn today for the first time on a 3 mile walk.
customer_reviews.author: DavidL

customer_reviews.title: light and extremely comfortable. Laces a bit awkward to hook and tie ...
customer_reviews.text: High quality , light and extremely comfortable. Laces a bit awkward to hook and tie compared to previous Berghaus walking boots
customer_reviews.author: Silverlining

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my daughter who has just got a dog and is walking a lot. She loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Margo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. Took no time to wear in. Sole really doesn’t slip.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: RELIABLE COMFORT
customer_reviews.text: Using boots for my favourite hobby WALKING ,always same make/style they never fail
customer_reviews.author: margaretfry

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Mum is always a 6.5 (40) and in this size the boot fit perfectly. Very pleased
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Berghaus are best
customer_reviews.text: Ordered size 6 first but Amazon were brilliant at exchanging for size 5.5. Now a superb boot to replace old Berghaus that were simply worn out with use. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. D. C. Wood

customer_reviews.title: Cant Fault Them!
customer_reviews.text: Size was perfect. They are comfortable, toastie warm and keep my feet dry. Whats not to like!
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: It comes in half sizes
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact eat cane in half sizes And easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: S.wright

customer_reviews.title: Makes a good first impression.
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, light weight and good looking boot. Time will tell if the waterproof lining is up to the job.
customer_reviews.author: R Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfectly so far, still need to test them in harsh hiking conditions!
customer_reviews.author: Aleksandra Kata

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Boot
customer_reviews.text: The boots fit well and are extremely comfortable when walking in all weather.
customer_reviews.author: Claire D

customer_reviews.title: Walking on air
customer_reviews.text: Lovely and comfortable, from putting them on the first day. Great walking boots, exactly like my previous pair
customer_reviews.author: Monkey chops

customer_reviews.title: very nice boots! good quality
customer_reviews.text: Present for the wife. Bought a size 5 and they seem to fit fine!
customer_reviews.author: Max Common

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: A good boot but did not fit me so I returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: excellent boots but the soles have worn down rather quickly sadly
customer_reviews.author: roisin rooney

customer_reviews.title: Great boot
customer_reviews.text: Really comfortable boot, needs high socks though as the ankle pad applies a little bit of pressure, other than that a great boot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great boots
customer_reviews.text: Love these walking boots, comfy from the first time worn and keep my feet warm and dry, just perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Look good
customer_reviews.text: Well made boots that fit my fit well. Look good too
customer_reviews.author: treegirl

customer_reviews.title: Excellent well made boots
customer_reviews.text: My last pair of these boots lasted 12 years! Bought the upgraded newer version. I must admit the right boot seems to sit a little higher up the ankle. Caused a bit of discomfort for the first few days but then put on a longer sock to create more padding around the ankle. Much better. They'll be ok once I've worn them for a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Batsinthebelfry

customer_reviews.title: Nice and comfy!!
customer_reviews.text: Well they look very smart and so far I've only been wearing them around the house to make sure I'm happy with the fit. One thing I did notice is that they come with a lifetime guarantee which is a definite plus point over other manufacturers.
customer_reviews.author: Hobdog

customer_reviews.title: trekking
customer_reviews.text: I am disappointed with these boots, after wearing them twice, the top cuts into my ankle which makes walking difficult. I bought these as my previous Berghaus were fantastic. I had been wearing them for 8 years during hours of trekking until the sole started to come off. I am not sure if I can return these new ones or what to do.
customer_reviews.author: arena

customer_reviews.title: Bought for my wife who is very happy with the boots
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my wife who is very happy with the boots. A little stiff when first worn but easy to break in. No problems with waterproofing. A little pricey perhaps. Would recommend to others. Hope this review is useful for others
customer_reviews.author: Patents Pending

customer_reviews.title: Worth every single penny!
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots. This is my second pair (the others lasted over five years being worn every day to walk the dog and never leaked). I have had these for a couple of months now and they are just as good. Worth every penny and fitted like a glove from the first wear. I personally don't believe that you should have to 'break in' new boots and I didn't have any problems with either pair..
customer_reviews.author: Gherkin

customer_reviews.title: Great walking boots at a good price
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd pair of berghaus boots having worn the soles out on my last 2 pairs. Saying that they were still 100% waterproof and so comfortable not one blister ever! If you have average width feet they are perfect and will last years, would always recommend - much cheaper than go outdoors!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... is my second pair of Berghaus walking boots and like my previous pair once they've been worn a couple ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of Berghaus walking boots and like my previous pair once they've been worn a couple of times the problem of rubbing on the ankle as many have stated previously does go away. It seems that we require our walking footwear to be utterly comfortable from the off, but after walking 16 miles on their first outing, I received no blisters or sores and thus I can't really complain. Overall they are a fine pair of walking boots well recommended and after breaking in they are most comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: saread

product_meta.title: Berghaus Women's Explorer Trek Plus Gore-Tex Walking Boots
product_meta.description: Waterproof guarantee - fully breathable and waterproof Hydroshell fabric keeps you dry when the weather turns
feature_bullets: Waterproof guarantee - fully breathable and waterproof Hydroshell fabric keeps you dry when the weather turns
Constructed for comfort - engineered OrthoLite foot beds give an exceptionally cushioned fit
Scuff-resistant suede shell with mesh fabric for reliable support and lasting style
Tested on rugged British landscapes for over 2,000 hours to guarantee reliability
